title: Billing Assistant
text:
Job Ref: HQ00070684 
A top 20 London based Law Firm are currently looking for a Billing Assistant until May 2016. You will report into the Accounting Services Manager to provide efficient and effective bill processing service, ensuring a high quality service in day to day work. As a Billing Assistant, you will be responsible for delivering draft billing reports to Matter Partners, interacting with a wide range of contacts at different levels, ensuring that draft bills and engrossed invoices are issued in line with the firm's policies and procedures, meeting all legislative regulations. Resolving issues whilst ensuring that no significant delays occur, ensuring that relevant authorisation is obtained where appropriate, in line with the firm's policies and ensuring the effective application of special rates and arrangements on all matters and taking measures to diagnose and rectify errors. 
To be successful within this role as a Billing Assistant, you should have experience working within a law firm environment with experience of billing processes and with Elite systems knowledge but not essential. If this sounds like you, please apply now as this is an urgent vacancy.
